data.name: Nightmares of the death
data.detailed_description:
Nightmares of the death is the tragic story about a teenager girl trying to escape from a misterious place while collecting different memories of who she used to be as a child and a teenager while learning the truth of why you end here.

No escaping:In this psychological horror game there is no resting you will be always in danger and there is no place of hiding,if you are find there is no coming back,if you don't are stealthy the result will be death.

Sound:In this game sound will be your friend while the enemies make a lot of noise that way you know if you are in danger or you are safe and you can continue exploring.

The unkwnon place: In this unknown place you will be enjoying different sub-places in which every single one has its own enemy or enemies like the park of loliness or the castle of memories.

Enemies: The enemies are demons searching for your soul to give it to the devil of the eternal hell, the clowns,the narators and the devil assistance will make you your life harder.

Collectables:Collect the different postcards of ''the ones who couldn't survive'' learning the different stories of people who got trap in this misterious place.

Graphics: Enjoy the full potencial of nightmares of the death with nvidea technology like ray tracing or nvidea dlls using quixel bridge technology.

data.short_description: Nightmares of the death it's a psychological horror game in which you will be exploring an unknown place as client 101 while learning the truth of why you are in this place collecting the memories of who you used to be.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

content_descriptors.notes: In this game you will see reference to hell,torture,blood,gore,violence and other material that not all people like.
